name: emas
description: Provides a command that players can use to replicate GM-only and player chat commands.Supported commands are: `!emas`, `!as`, `!w`, `!r`, `!gr`, `!desc`.For instructions run any of the commands with no arguments, or visit [Emas on the Wiki](https://wiki.roll20.net/Text_Chat#Speaking_and_Emoting_as_a_Random_NPC_.28.2Fas.29_.28.2Femas.29)
